lab.name: Vision Intelligence Lab
lab.description: We are a research group at Drexel University led by Prof. Feng Liu, focused on advancing computer vision, machine learning, and artificial intelligence to solve fundamental and applied problems in 3D vision, generative AI, and AI for societal impact.

highlights.title: 3D Vision & Intelligence
highlights.description: Exploring next-generation methods for 3D object/scene understanding and immersive VR/AR applications.

highlights.title: Generative AI
highlights.description: Building controllable and explainable generative models with applications in healthcare, education, and beyond.

highlights.title: Societal Impact
highlights.description: Leveraging AI for healthcare, education, and human-centered applications.

news.title: New paper accepted at CVPR 2025
news.description: Our work on advanced 3D scene understanding has been accepted at CVPR 2025.

news.title: Lab welcomes new PhD students
news.description: We are excited to welcome three new PhD students to our research group this fall.

news.title: Prof. Liu receives Best Paper Award
news.description: Congratulations to Prof. Liu and team for receiving the Best Paper Award at ECCV 2024.

news.title: New NSF grant awarded
news.description: Our lab has been awarded a new NSF grant to advance research in explainable AI for healthcare applications.

faculty.name: Dr. Feng Liu
faculty.description: Department of Computer Science, Drexel University

phd_students.name: Open Position
phd_students.description: We're recruiting exceptional PhD candidates to join our research team. Apply now!

phd_students.description: We're recruiting exceptional PhD candidates to join our research team. Apply now!

publications.title: Advanced Neural Architectures for Real-Time Object Detection

publications.title: Interpretable Deep Learning for Medical Image Analysis

faq.question: What research areas does the lab focus on?
faq.answer: Our lab focuses on three main areas: 3D Vision & Intelligence, Generative AI, and AI for Societal Impact. We work on fundamental and applied problems in computer vision and machine learning.

faq.question: Are you accepting new students?
faq.answer: We are always looking for motivated PhD students. If you're interested in joining our lab, please check the admissions requirements and reach out via our contact page.

faq.question: How can I collaborate with the lab?
faq.answer: We welcome collaborations with researchers and industry partners. Please contact Prof. Feng Liu through the contact information provided on this website.

faq.question: Where is the lab located?
faq.answer: We are located in the Department of Computer Science at Drexel University in Philadelphia, PA.

faq.question: What opportunities are available for undergraduate students?
faq.answer: We offer research opportunities for motivated undergraduate students. Please reach out to discuss potential projects and availability.
